features: NO DUSTPANS, NO BENDING DOWN: Pick up and dispose of messes with one tool
ALWAYS READY TO CLEAN: No batteries, no charging, no dragging cords. Rotating brushroll works on hard floors or carpet with one-touch debris release
QUICK + QUIET: Virtually silent so you won't disturb children or pets. Handles kitchen floor cleaning, hardwood floor cleaning, area rug cleaning, and more with ease.
NO CRUMB LEFT BEHIND: Gets into tight spaces easily, like under furniture, to pick up dust and dirt. Combines the versatility of a broom with many benefits of a vacuum or floor sweeper.
SELF-STANDING DESIGN: Tucks away easily when not in use. Lightweight, sturdy construction - under 2 lb with comfort grip handle and 54" pole

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Goes Where Vacuums Can't Specially designed to get into hard-to-reach places with ease. No Dustpans, No More Bending Down Pick up and dispose of messes with one tool. Always Ready To Clean No batteries, no charging, no dragging cords across the room to clean. Quick & Quiet Virtually silent so you won't disturb children or pets when you need a quick pick up

Quick Pickups Made Easy On Floors & Rugs! Virtually Silent Cleaning The Flippr Sweep Cleaner is virtually silent when picking up, with no whining motors or batteries needed Cleans Any Surface Perfect for hardwood floor cleaning or area rugs Easy To Use Easily release debris into the trash with one button push

Quickly & Easily Clean Floors Rotating brushroll works on hard floors or carpet Soft Touch Angled Bristles With built in hair comb and brushroll. Compact & Lightweight Self-stands, weighs less than 2 pounds, compact design is easy to tuck away Comfortable Handle 2 super comfortable foam handles and hook for wall hanging.

Smarter Solutions for Safer, Cleaner and Healthier Living Innovation starts with identifying a need, not creating one At Flippr, we take great pride in developing products that make a safe, clean, healthy and positive impact on the lives of our customers. Our goal is to create the unexpected, surprising our customers through problem-solving innovation, designed with a stylish, modern aesthetic. Jason Thorne, Flippr’s Founder and CEO, brings 20+ years of engineering and development experience in consumer products. He involves consumers in his process to ensure he brings solutions to meet their needs. Prior to this, he was head of engineering for an industry leader in small appliances. Our founding team has extensive design, engineering, and development experience creating consumer products. Many that you know and love for an industry leader in small appliances. With over 150 patents covering 75 consumer products, our team brings creativity and experience that you can trust.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This little guy is so cool! Easy assemble, picks up everything. Cool little gadget and doesn’t take up space to store it. Really convenient.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My kitchen floor is so clean now! It didn’t miss a speck of dust! Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Well-designed 2-in-1 Broom and Floor Sweeper yet couldn't pick up all crumbs at one time.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This 2-in-1 Broom & Floor Sweeper is very convenient for cleaning the floor. The assembly is a little bit complicated, yet still fine with a reference to the user manual. The manual is well-written with step-by-step instructions. The good thing is it is 2-in-1 so it saves storage space and makes it faster to sweep and pick up the crumbs.It is lightweight considering putting two tools into one. It looks sturdy and durable. The switching of the broom and floor sweeper is simple and fast. The broom works smoothly and quietly. The width is not too big so it is convenient to sweep the narrow and hard-to-reach areas. The self standing ability is a plus so I can put it anywhere and not always need to lean on the wall.The con of the floor sweeper is that it doesn't pick up all the crumbs with ease. Sometimes, I have to move several times to pick up the last piece of crumbs. Overall, it works well and it is a good alternative to the vacuum cleaner especially when a small area is needed to be cleaned.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars unique, doesn't pick everything up
reviews.reviewText: I got this to use in my bedroom. I like that it stores small and allows a vacuum and broom to be stashed and not take a lot of space. It is lightweight and you can switch between roller and broom function without having to dump the catch bin.There are a couple of things that could use improvement. The head is very narrow, and I could have used a wider option. It is good at picking up smaller things, but larger things (like leaves) or heavier things (like pon gravel) just get pushed around.Seems sturdy enough, and it will get used, but not the magic I had hoped for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The Flippr sweep cleaner has been great for quick cleanups in my classroom! The students love it too! 🎉🎉🎉

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Decent Broom for Small Living Spaces
reviews.reviewText: I was really looking forward to trying out this broom sweeper after seeing the two modes that it has. After using it however I am a little underwhelmed. It was pretty easy to assemble in just a couple minutes and the broom works well as it should, but it is a little smaller than your normal house broom which does not make it ideal if you have a large home. The function to switch it to a brushroll didn't always work the best though and the brushroll that is supposed to pick up everything you just swept into a pile did not work as intended a majority of the time. It often times just spread your nealty swept pile around on the floor requiring you to sweep it back into a pile again and trying to rollover it again rather then picking everything up in one go. This made it so that we hardly ever used the brushrooll feature and opted to just sweep it into a dustpan or vacuum the pile up. The $55 price tag is also way to high for this product. The quality and functionality of it does not warrant that price whatsoever. I would suggest just getting a $10 broom with a dustpan over this. Overall, I cannot recommend this unless it drops to around $25 and even then with the brushroll being hit or miss in picking stuff up I still do not know if I would recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Like a very quiet vacuum
reviews.reviewText: Like a very quiet vacuumI was a tad skeptical at first, but it really does work. Assembly is very straightforward. The button responds quickly. It’s ideal for those everyday quick cleans. I also started using it early in the morning or late at night when I needed a quick clean without making noise.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Light weight, easy to put together. It works really well on concrete floors as well as all others. Very pleased with this product, would definitely buy again. Kent
